attributes.action: Ensure the Funding for Jodrell Bank Radio Telescope
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jodrell Bank Radio Telescope may have to close down due to a shortfall of £2.5m.  It is, or should be, the Government's responsibility to ensure funding for this, and other, World Class Science Projects.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
